name: ratemystore
description: 🏪 RateMyStore RateMyStore is a full-stack web application developed for the FullStack Intern Coding Challenge. It enables users to register, log in, and rate stores (1–5 stars) with role-based dashboards for Normal Users, Store Owners, and System Administrators. The frontend features a modern, minimalistic glassmorphism design with subtle animations, built using React.js and Bootstrap, while the backend uses Express.js and MySQL/PostgreSQL with JWT authentication. Table of Contents
